titles.title: A bill to clarify the rules of origin for certain textile and apparel products.
A bill to clarify the rules of origin for certain textile and apparel products.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Uruguay Round Agreements Act to exempt certain window shades and blinds classified under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States from principles used in the Act to determine the origin of certain textile and apparel products.
